baberiyawen liyumak -

‘‘bahun che saranan yaththi pababathani wanani cha aarama rukkha chethyani manussa bhaya thajakdhitha (minisa bhaya santha්rasayata pathwana awasthawan hi di parwatha, wana gahana, aaramayan, wrukshayan ha chaithyasthanayan pihita pathana’ bawa nyahewath manasika bindawatimwala di adhi manushiya abhichara widhin anugamanaya kirimata yomuwana bawa‘ min kiyawe)’’ ewani awasthawala di yata ki atham da piris adhi manushiya yathukarmika abhichara widhin hora rahasema anugamanayata pelambaena muth ee bawa yam awasthawaka pa්rasiddhiyata path wanne yayi hangi yana oonama witeka di itha thadin eeta pahara gasimata owuhu pelambaethi.
